products...",value:search,onChange:e=>setSearch(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:category,onChange:e=>setCategory(e.target.value),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"All",children:"All \u20B9",product.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setSelectedProduct(product),children:"View Details"})]},product.id))}),selectedProduct&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modal",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"close",onClick:()=>setSelectedProduct(null),children:"\xD7"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:selectedProduct.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:selectedProduct.image,alt:selectedProduct.name,className:"product-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:selectedProduct.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Price: \u20B9",selectedProduct.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:quantity,min:"1",onChange:e=>setQuantity(parseInt(e.target.value))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleAddToCart(selectedProduct),children:"Add to Cart"})]})})]});};export default Products;
